Description: A structure designed to collect water for watering livestock.
A beached boat, protruding from the surface and thus constituting a topographical landmark.
Tall tower bearing at its summit a powerful fire intended to guide ships during the night.
A wetland characterized by the progressive accumulation of peat. The soil is characterized by its very high content of organic matter, little or not decomposed, of plant origin.
A circular, non-illuminated masonry maritime beacon structure.
A circular, illuminated masonry structure used for maritime beaconing.
